languages.text: На алтаре водружен старинный образ, изображающий святого Махариуса. Роскошная рама покрыта отметинами — реликвия была добыта в бою на одном из отдаленных забытых миров.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Святая вещь, алтарь с иконой которую выдали/добыла предыдущий вольны торговец или твой дом.

languages.text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.
languages.original_text: На алтаре водружен старинный образ, изображающий святого Махариуса. Роскошная рама покрыта отметинами — реликвия была добыта в бою на одном из отдаленных забытых миров.

traits.locale_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was retrieved in battle on a remote and forgotten world.
Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was retrieved in battle on a remote and forgotten world.
Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.
Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.
Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

languages.text: 摆在祭坛上的，是一尊古老的圣马卡里乌斯圣像，圣洁的躯体上布满了印记。这件圣遗物是在某个被遗忘的遥远世界中夺回的。
languages.original_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

traits.locale_text: 摆在祭坛上的，是一尊古老的圣马卡里乌斯圣像，圣洁的躯体上布满了印记。这件圣遗物是在某个被遗忘的遥远世界中夺回的。

languages.text: Sobre el altar hay una antigua figura de san Macharius. Su regia figura está llena de marcas: la reliquia fue obtenida durante una batalla en un mundo lejano y olvidado.
languages.original_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

traits.locale_text: Sobre el altar hay una antigua figura de san Macharius. Su regia figura está llena de marcas: la reliquia fue obtenida durante una batalla en un mundo lejano y olvidado.

languages.text: 聖マカリウスの古代の姿が描かれた肖像画が祭壇に飾られている。威厳ある額縁には無数の細かい傷がある。この至宝は遠方の忘れら去られた世界で繰り広げられた戦いで得たものらしい。
languages.original_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

traits.locale_text: 聖マカリウスの古代の姿が描かれた肖像画が祭壇に飾られている。威厳ある額縁には無数の細かい傷がある。この至宝は遠方の忘れら去られた世界で繰り広げられた戦いで得たものらしい。

languages.text: Auf dem Altar steht ein altes Bildnis von Sankt Macharius. Der majestätische Rahmen ist mit Zeichen und Markierungen übersät – das Relikt war Beute bei einer Schlacht auf einer entlegenen und vergessenen Welt.
languages.original_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

traits.locale_text: Auf dem Altar steht ein altes Bildnis von Sankt Macharius. Der majestätische Rahmen ist mit Zeichen und Markierungen übersät – das Relikt war Beute bei einer Schlacht auf einer entlegenen und vergessenen Welt.

languages.text: Au-dessus de l'autel se dresse un antique portrait de Saint Macharius. Le cadre majestueux est couvert de marques, signe que cette relique a été arrachée de force à un monde lointain et oublié.
languages.original_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

traits.locale_text: Au-dessus de l'autel se dresse un antique portrait de Saint Macharius. Le cadre majestueux est couvert de marques, signe que cette relique a été arrachée de force à un monde lointain et oublié.

languages.text: Sunağın üzerinde Aziz Macharius'un kadim bir resmi yer alıyor. Görkemli çerçevesi izlerle kaplı. Yadigâr, uzak ve unutulmuş bir dünyada gerçekleşen bir muharebede ele geçirilmiş.
languages.original_text: Standing upon the altar is an ancient image of Saint Macharius. Its regal frame is covered in marks — the relic was claimed in a battle on a remote and forgotten world.

traits.locale_text: Sunağın üzerinde Aziz Macharius'un kadim bir görseli yer alıyor. Görkemli çerçevesi izlerle kaplı. Yadigâr, uzak ve unutulmuş bir dünyada gerçekleşen bir muharebede ele geçirilmiş.
